name: Opera Job Management Compressed File
summary: Learn about .OZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: OZ files are created using the oz.exe utility, which is included with Opera Job Management. They can also be generated on older DOS machines using the ozdos.exe 8-bit version of the utility.
NOTE: Opera Job Management is a Windows application, but it can also run in Linux with Wine installed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
